headline: APA Corporation Provides Second-Quarter 2025 Supplemental Information and  Schedules Results Conference Call for August 7 at 10 a.m. Central Time
summary: HOUSTON, July 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- APA Corporation (Nasdaq: APA) today provided supplemental information regarding certain second-quarter 2025 financial and operational results. This information is intended only to provide additional information regarding current estimates management believes will affect results for the second-quarter 2025. It is provided to assist investors, analysts and others in formulating their own estimates, and is not intended to be a comprehensive presentation of

headline: APA curtails US natgas and NGL production in second quarter on weak prices
summary: APA Corp said on Wednesday itcurtailed about 10 million of cubic feet per day ofU.S. natural gas production and 750 barrels per day of U.S.natural gas liquids output during the second quarter due...
